Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.562 contains an illuminated panel on the bottom of the page that is the chapter heading for chapter 79 (Surat al-nazi"at). It is written in Thuluth script in gold ink on a red ground.
